guide.title: User's guide
guide.gettingStartedDesc1: Welcome to your communication app! This app helps you express yourself through phrases, images, and interactive features.
guide.gettingStartedDesc2: Navigate through different screens using the bottom tabs: Home, Phrases, Challenge, Shop, Settings, and History.
guide.homeScreenDesc1: Your personalized dashboard displaying your avatar, bookmarked phrases, and quick access buttons.
guide.homeScreenDesc2: Tap bookmarked phrases to use them instantly, or long-press to manage bookmarks. Access recent history, daily challenges, and QR code scanning from here.
guide.phrasesNavigationDesc1: Browse through categories like Food & Drinks, Directions, Emergency, and Others to find the phrases you need.
guide.phrasesNavigationDesc2: Use the search bar to quickly find specific phrases. Tap phrases to speak them aloud or navigate deeper into subcategories.
guide.addingPhrasesDesc1: Tap the '+' button in the Phrases screen to add your own custom phrases with optional images.
guide.addingPhrasesDesc2: Choose between simple categories or advanced processes with multiple choices, speech settings, and workflow branching.
guide.editingPhrasesDesc1: Long-press any phrase to access edit options. You can modify text, change images, or adjust process settings.
guide.editingPhrasesDesc2: Delete phrases by selecting the delete option in the edit menu. Confirm the deletion to permanently remove the phrase.
guide.bookmarkSystemDesc1: Long-press phrases to bookmark them for quick access on your Home screen.
guide.bookmarkSystemDesc2: Bookmarked phrases are highlighted yellow and are sorted by usage frequency. Remove bookmarks by long-pressing and selecting the option.
guide.processingModeDesc1: Some phrases activate processing mode, where you build complete sentences by selecting multiple choices in sequence.
guide.processingModeDesc2: Follow the speech prompts at the top, make your selections, and tap 'Next' to complete your message. Use multi-select for complex requests.
guide.dailyChallengeDesc1: Complete daily tasks to earn coins! Each day presents a new challenge requiring you to navigate to specific phrases or complete processes.
guide.dailyChallengeDesc2: Submit your answer after completing the challenge. Successful completion rewards you with coins to spend in the shop.
guide.shopAvatarDesc1: Spend earned coins to unlock new avatar items including hats, shirts, pants, shoes, and accessories.
guide.shopAvatarDesc2: Select different categories in the shop to browse items. Tap locked items to purchase with coins, or tap unlocked items to equip them.
guide.historyTrackingDesc1: View your conversation history to see previously used phrase combinations and selections.
guide.historyTrackingDesc2: Tap history items to replay them with speech. Long-press to bookmark frequently used combinations or delete unwanted entries.
guide.languageSettingsDesc1: Switch between English, Chinese, Malaysian, and Tamil languages by tapping the flag icons in Settings.
guide.languageSettingsDesc2: Choose your preferred button layout style and select from different voice options for text-to-speech functionality.
guide.emergencyFeaturesDesc1: Set up a caregiver phone number in Settings for quick emergency access through the Emergency phrase category.
guide.emergencyFeaturesDesc2: The Emergency button provides instant access to call your designated caregiver when you need immediate help.
guide.qrCodeScanningDesc1: Use the QR code scanner from the Home screen to receive rewards or access special content shared by others.
guide.qrCodeScanningDesc2: Point your camera at supported QR codes to automatically process commands like receiving coins from caregivers or friends.
guide.searchFunctionDesc1: Use the search bar in Phrases to quickly find specific words or phrases across all categories and subcategories.
guide.searchFunctionDesc2: Search results show the full path to each phrase, making it easy to locate items in complex category structures.
guide.accessibilityFeaturesDesc1: All phrases support text-to-speech with natural voices in multiple languages for clear communication.
guide.accessibilityFeaturesDesc2: Large buttons, clear images, and simple navigation make the app accessible for users with different abilities and needs.
